qas.question: When did the French obtain Algeria?
Where did the Algiers immigrants come from?
What was the Catalan immigrant's speech called?
How many Catalan speakers lived in Algiers by 1911?
When did most Catalan speakers leave northern Catalonia?

context: Following the French capture of Algeria (<a0_0>1833<a0_0/>), that region saw several waves of Catalan-speaking settlers. People from the Spanish Alacant province settled around Oran, whereas Algiers received immigration from <a1_0>Northern Catalonia and Minorca<a1_0/>. Their speech was known as <a2_0>patuet<a2_0/>. By 1911, the number of Catalan speakers was <a3_0>around 100,000<a3_0/>. After the declaration of independence of Algeria in <a4_0>1962<a4_0/>, almost all the Catalan speakers fled to Northern Catalonia (as Pieds-Noirs) or Alacant.
